about_the_game:
In this DLC, a corresponding event unlocking task will be added.
After completion of this event, six new types of flying vehicles will be sold and ordered.
When you install the DLC, you will get a purchase order for these vehicles in your backpack. You can use the right button to get the vehicle directly (in your garage).
Ordering and purchasing need to complete the corresponding branch event to unlock.
The DLC can be used in both storyline and empire modes. Each time a new file is created, the DLC will be activated again and the gift items will be reset in the warden's backpack.

At the same time, the DLC will also unlock new 13 vehicle effects:
Pilotless
When the warden traveled on the vehicle, the governors felt an increase of 10 points per hour, car wear increased by 50%, the governor’s strength recovered by 10 points per hour, and consumed 20 reputation per hour.

Air jail
When the governor takes the vehicle out, he gains 50 prestige every hour; all prisoners gain 100% experience points; prison productivity is reduced by 70%; consumes 20 reputation per hour and consumes 100,000 U.S. dollars per hour. cost.

Airboat ad
When the governor took the vehicle out of the vehicle, he received an advertising fee of 500,000 US dollars per hour; the loyalty of the gang leader in the prison dropped by 2 points per hour; the emotional value of all jailed prisoners decreased by 3 points per hour.

Air smuggling
When the warden took the vehicle, the purchase of all raw materials on the ground decreased by 3,000, and the purchase of all raw materials on the ground increased by 700.

Airship One
When the warden takes the vehicle, it continues to increase its reputation by 80 points per hour. The guard's value within the checkpoint is reduced by 30%. The value of the relationship between all gangs and you is reduced by 5 points per hour, reducing the prestige by 50 points per hour.

Gun Convoy
When the warden took the vehicle, the purchase limit of all raw materials for firearms increased by 500.

Chemical smuggling boats
When the warden took the vehicle, the purchase limit of all chemical raw materials increased by 500.

Fake smugglers
When the warden took the vehicle, the purchase limit of all counterfeit raw materials increased by 500.

Summon a flying boat raid
When the warden took the vehicle, a new Summoned Airship Raid effect appeared in the skill book.

Summon Tiger Shark Raid
When the warden takes the vehicle, a new summons the Tiger Shark raid.

Summon Great White Whale Raid
When the warden takes the vehicle, new attack skills for summoning the white whale attack can be unlocked in the skill book.

Jet Propeller (fly)
The spacecraft's exclusive vehicle effect increases the speed of the vehicle's movement by 100%.

Eye of God
When the governor took the vehicle out of the house, the production efficiency of all the processing workshops inside the prison increased by 600%; the prisoner’s mood value in the prison decreased by 5 points per hour and consumed 50 prestige per hour; the loyalty of the headmen in the prison was an hour. Reduce 2 points.

In this DLC, a corresponding event unlocking task will be added.
After completion of this event, six new types of flying vehicles will be sold and ordered.
When you install the DLC, you will get a purchase order for these vehicles in your backpack. You can use the right button to get the vehicle directly (in your garage).
Ordering and purchasing need to complete the corresponding branch event to unlock.
The DLC can be used in both storyline and empire modes. Each time a new file is created, the DLC will be activated again and the gift items will be reset in the warden's backpack.

At the same time, the DLC will also unlock new 13 vehicle effects:
Pilotless
When the warden traveled on the vehicle, the governors felt an increase of 10 points per hour, car wear increased by 50%, the governor’s strength recovered by 10 points per hour, and consumed 20 reputation per hour.

fullgame.name: 上帝之城 I：监狱帝国 [City of God I - Prison Empire]

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 （Best for 64 Bit)| Can't run on XP
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB graphics memory, capable of Shader Model 1.1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 , 8 , 10（Best for 64 Bit) | Can't run on XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

When you install the DLC, you will get a purchase order for these vehicles in your backpack. You can use the right button to get the vehicle directly (in your garage).
